content.rendered:
‘The report reflects another year of hard work and innovation in response to the formidable task of advocating for the rights and interests of the 2.5 billion citizens of the Commonwealth. With a close eye on its strategic goals, the Foundation continues to broaden and deepen its connections with civil society organisations across all regions of the Commonwealth. Of particular note is its steadily increasing engagement with small and vulnerable states, where civil society is too often fragile and in need of carefully targeted support.’

(Continues inside document)

FundFinity Grants Annual Report 2023-24
